<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Installing</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" />
</head>

<body>
    <main>
        <?php
        function add_day_with_overflow_always_next_day($date) {
            $new_date = new DateTime($date);
            $date = new DateTime($date);
            $new_date->modify('+1 day');
            return $new_date->format('d.m.Y');
          }
          
        include_once("./password.php");

        if (!empty($_COOKIE["LXE_PASSWORD"])) {
        if ($_COOKIE["LXE_PASSWORD"] == $CODE) {
        $folder_path = "days/";
        $curent_date = time();
        $max = [
        ];
        $NewArray = [];
        array_push($max, $curent_date);
        $NewArray[$curent_date] = $curent_date;
        if (is_dir($folder_path)) {
            if ($handle = opendir($folder_path)) {
                echo "<ul>";
                // Parcours tous les fichiers et dossiers du dossier
                while (false !== ($entry = readdir($handle))) {
                    if ($entry != "." && $entry != "..") {
                        array_push($max, $entry);
                    $NewArray[$entry] = $entry;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        print_r($NewArray);
        $date = $NewArray[(string)max($max)];
        $nouvelle_date = add_day_with_overflow_always_next_day(date("Y-m-d", (int)$date));
        mkdir("days/".(string)strtotime($nouvelle_date));
        header("Location: index.php");

    }else {
        header("Location: start.php");
        }
    }else {
        header("Location: start.php");
        }

?>
    </main>
    <style>
    .IsDo {
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    td a {
        color: white;
    }

    td {
        border: 1px solid black;
        background: black;
        color: white;
        padding: 20px;
    }

    tr {
        width: 100%;
    }

    body {
        background: rgb(182, 91, 91);
        font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    }

    main {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        width: 70%;
        height: 70%;
        background-color: white;
        border: 10px solid black;
        border-radius: 20px;
        box-shadow: inset 0 0 20px 0px;
        overflow: scroll;
    }

    input {
        padding: 10px;
        background-color: salmon;
        color: black;
        border-radius: 20px;
        transition: 0.5s;
    }

    input[type="submit"]:hover {
        letter-spacing: 5px;
    }

    .red {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        color: red;
    }
    </style>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Installing</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" />
</head>

<body>
    <main>

        <?php
function rmAllDir($strDirectory)
{
    $handle = opendir($strDirectory);
    while(false !== ($entry = readdir($handle))){
        if($entry != '.' && $entry != '..'){
            if(is_dir($strDirectory.'/'.$entry)){
                rmAllDir($strDirectory.'/'.$entry);
            }
            elseif(is_file($strDirectory.'/'.$entry)){
                unlink($strDirectory.'/'.$entry);
            }
        }
    }
    rmdir($strDirectory.'/'.$entry);
    closedir($handle);
}
        include_once("./password.php");

rmAllDir("days/".$_GET["day"]);

./test.php:
<?php
header("content-type: application/json");
function addJSONAsDIR($dir, $data) {
if ($dh = opendir($dir)) {
    while (($entry2 = readdir($dh)) !== false) {
        if ($entry2 != "." && $entry2 != "..") {
            $entry2 = $dir . $entry2;
                // Obtenez le contenu du fichier et échappez-le correctement avant de l'insérer dans la chaîne JSON
                // Créez un tableau associatif pour encoder en JSON
                // Retournez le contenu JSON dans la réponse
                if (is_dir($entry2)) {
                    $data[$entry2] = 0;
                    $data = addJSONAsDIR($entry2."/", $data);
                } else {
                    $fileContent = file_get_contents($entry2);
                    $data[$entry2] = $fileContent;
                }
        }
    }
}
return $data;
}

file_put_contents("content.json",json_encode(addJSONAsDIR("./", []), JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE));
